com.orsoncharts.graphics3d

Class Utils3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orsoncharts.graphics3d.Utils3D

  • public class Utils3D
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of utility methods for 3D geometry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double angle(Point3D a, Point3D b)
      Returns the angle between the two vectors.

      Returns the length of the vector v.
      static Point3D normal(Point3D a, Point3D b, Point3D c)
      Returns the normal vector for the plane defined by three points.
      static Point3D normalise(Point3D v)
      Returns a new vector that is the normalised form of the specified vector.
      static double scalarprod(Point3D a, Point3D b)
      Returns the scalar product of two vectors.
